name: .EXE (itch) (hoodieratboi)
description:
A classic creepypasta, retold.

Includes 3 unique endings, 2 bad, and 1 good.

WARNING: this game contains disturbing imagery and cartoon depictions of blood. It is not suitable for those who are easily disturbed.
